name: Glitched Garden
description:
A Two Week Project with online Assets. I design and coded everything in this game and even with my limited knowledge in my 3th Semester i figured out to get everything work properly.

It even works on mobile!

I learned about my first Splashscreen. Interlinked Mechanics and a Menu-System.

I also worked alot with the Unity Animator to get use Methods Frame-Perfect.
